pid: armeniaca mume var. mume f. purpurea

basic.floral_language:
Armeniaca mume var. mume f. purpurea
Floriography: pride, strong and faithful 
Armeniaca mume var. mume f. purpurea blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower, has been named as the city flower of Wuhan. 
Armeniaca mume var. mume f. purpurea plant strong firm and pretty. Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Armeniaca mume var. mume f. purpurea blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period February-March, viewing period 1-2 weeks

display_pid: Armeniaca mume var. mume f. purpurea

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, top-dressing before and after flowering and defoliation
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
